t: Dollar General is testing Amazon-style tech that lets customers leave without checking out
s: June 29, 2023 - The US's largest dollar store chain is experimenting with Amazon-like cashierless technology, the company confirmed to Insider. Customers at a Dollar General store in Banner Elk, North Carolina, don't have to stand in line or deal with a self-checkout kiosk at the end of their visit.
